pma:database.name: testing
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `usuarios` ( `id` int(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nombre` text NOT NULL, `apellido` text NOT NULL, `email` text NOT NULL, `fecha_nacimiento` date NOT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), `deleted_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp(), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_spanish_ci;
